summary: Implements an inâ€‘memory mock of the DynamoDB Streams service for the Moto testing library, providing a backend that tracks stream metadata, shards and iterator state, and handling API calls such as listing streams, describing a stream, obtaining shard iterators, and fetching records.
business_intent: Allows developers to test and develop applications that interact with DynamoDB Streams without accessing real AWS resources, facilitating reliable unit and integration testing.
